wikipedia_page.main: Malachi Mitchell-Thomas (23 September 1995 – 14 May 2016) was a motorcycle racer from Chorley, Lancashire.

response: Malachi Mitchell-Thomas died as a result of a crash on the third lap of the Supertwins race at the Vauxhall International North West 200 on 14 May 2016.
*Malachi Mitchell-Thomas, 20, English motorcycle racer, injuries sustained in race collision.North West 200: Rider dies in fatal crash
